Task_Name: Review existing AKS infrastructure and identify eligible clusters
Conduct kickoff workshop with CloudOps and DevOps leads
Notes: Define success criteria and rollout timeline

Task_Name: Analyze current workload patterns for spot pool sizing
Finalize spot node pool configuration (D/E/F families
Define on-demand fallback pool sizing and priority expander
Design Grafana dashboards and alerting thresholds
Security review of network policies and RBAC configuration

Run Terraform module validation and unit tests
Review and adapt SRE runbooks for organizational context
Validate non-prod environment readiness for testing
Execute complete test suite in non-prod environment (unit + integration)
Run chaos engineering tests in non-prod (eviction scenarios)
Fix any issues found in non-prod testing
Obtain sign-off from non-prod testing phase

Select and approve Pilot Cluster #2 (dev/test environment)

Deploy spot-enabled AKS module to Pilot Cluster #2
Establish baseline metrics for both pilot clusters

Migrate first batch of spot-tolerant workloads to Pilot Cluster #2
Execute spot eviction simulation on Pilot Cluster #1
Execute spot eviction simulation on Pilot Cluster #2
Monitor pilot clusters for stability issues (48-hour observation)
Conduct pilot retrospective with teams and document lessons learned
Obtain pilot sign-off to proceed to staging
Deploy full spot configuration to staging environment
Migrate eligible staging workloads to spot pools
Execute chaos testing in staging environment
Obtain staging sign-off for production deployment
Create detailed production rollout plan with rollback triggers
Conduct production deployment go/no-go meeting
Execute production deployment during maintenance window
Deploy Kubernetes Descheduler for sticky fallback fix
Migrate Batch 1 (20%) of eligible production workloads to spot
Monitor Batch 1 for 72 hours before proceeding
Migrate Batch 2 (40% cumulative) of eligible production workloads to spot
Monitor Batch 2 for 72 hours before proceeding
Migrate Batch 3 (70% cumulative) of eligible production workloads to spot
Monitor Batch 3 for 72 hours before proceeding
Migrate Batch 4 (100% of eligible) production workloads to spot
Final production migration verification (48-hour stability check)
Verify actual cost savings against projected targets (30-day measurement)
Confirm 99.9% availability target met with spot eviction events handled
Conduct post-implementation review and document final results
Finalize all documentation (architecture diagrams
Conduct training sessions for CloudOps (operations)
Conduct training sessions for DevOps (workload configuration)

Analyze autoscaler behavior and tune scan intervals/scale-down delays
